knimeNode.name: Boolean Configuration
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides a boolean configuration option to an encapsulating component's dialog. Outputs an integer flow variable with the set value (boolean).

intro.p: Outputs an integer flow variable with a given number value (boolean).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in the dialog
Some lines of description that will be shown for instance in the node description of the component exposing a dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution). This will also be the name of the exported flow variable.
The value that is selected by default.
If set, the output variable will be of type integer (as opposed to type boolean).

ports.outPort: Variable output with the given variable defined.
